individual_metadata.synopsis: One of the gith kids can't wait for the player to open the chest (knowing that a gremishka will pop out.) Before opening chest - gleeful anticipation. After opening chest - laughing in the player's face.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to MageHandKid02 after you've made them stop shoving the chest.loadlevel CRE_Main_Ateleport MageHandKid02speak with + intimidate to stopspeak with again

0.speaker: Ra'jak
0.text: Don't you want to know what's inside?
0.context: NodeContext: Teasing/mock thoughtfulness; knows there's a gremishka in the chest they're trying to get the player to open

1.speaker: Ra'jak
1.text: Adults are so rubbish. You never let us have any fun.

2.speaker: Ra'jak
2.text: Open the chest! Open the chest! ...Please?
2.context: NodeContext: Frenzied excitement/chanting - then pleading on "Please?"; knows there's a gremishka in the chest they're trying to get the player to open

3.speaker: Ra'jak
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Incredibly amused at the gremishka having jumped out of the chest and attacked the player.NodeContext: A laugh like Nelson in the Simpsons.

4.speaker: Ra'jak
4.text: Why'd you take it? We were just playing!
